spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Increases your Mastery by 72 and your Leech by 36.
Your secondary stats are all increased by 56.
While Bladestorming, every 0.7 sec you gain 5% movement speed and 72 Strength, stacking. Lasts 6 sec.

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description:
Blast your target with a ball of concentrated flame, dealing 155 Fire damage to an enemy or healing an ally for 155, then burn the target for an additional 75% of the damage or healing done over 6 sec.

Each cast of Concentrated Flame deals 100% increased damage or healing. This bonus resets after every third cast.
Max 2 Charges.

passive_spell_tooltip.description: Your spells and abilities have a chance to cauterize your target for 398 Fire damage over 10 sec or to heal an ally for 398 over 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to strike your target for 115 Fire damage, and heal you for 50% of the damage dealt.

If your target is below 20% health, the chance for extra damage is increased by 400%.

Unique:  Corruption Resistance increased by 10.

Reduces the cooldown of Recklessness by 10.0%, and increases your Versatility by 3.

When you activate Recklessness, immediately heal for 5% of maximum health.

Your critical strikes with spells and abilities grant a stack of Blood-Soaked, increasing Critical Strike by 1. Upon reaching 40 stacks, you gain 22 Haste for 8 sec.

Blood-Soaked has a 25% chance of only consuming 30 stacks.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant 54 critical strike rating for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
Rampage deals an additional 403 damage and has a 8% chance to grant you Recklessness for 4 sec.
When Recklessness expires, your Critical Strike is increased by 216 for 5 sec. Your auto attacks will refresh the duration of this effect.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cruel Gladiator's Plate Shoulders

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant you Elemental Whirl, increasing your Critical Strike, Haste, Mastery, or Versatility by 238 for 10 sec.
Your secondary stats are all increased by 56.
Rampage deals an additional 488 damage and has a 8% chance to grant you Recklessness for 4 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 85 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 476 Strength up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 135,029 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 202,554.

Use: Unleash your inner tempest to gain 8,794 Strength for 15 sec. Your next 3 abilities cause a lightning blast dealing 482,237 Nature damage to your primary target. Damage increased by 100% with each subsequent blast. (2 Min Cooldown)
